beer.name: The Kaiser
beer.description: The Kaiser sonce said, "Give me a woman who loves beer and I will conquer the world." If the Kaiser and his significant other had tipped this bottle, we'd all be "sprechenden Deutsch!" We took all that is good in a traditional Oktoberfest - gorgeous, deep copper sheen, massive malty backbone and spicy, floral, pungent noble hops - then intensified each into this, an Imperial Oktoberfest.
beer.grains: Two-row barley, Vienna, Munich 10L, m-100, aromatic
Two-row barley, Vienna, Munich 10L, m-100, aromatic
